item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, January 30, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Commercial jet collides with Black Hawk helicopter near Reagan airport (118 points | 69 comments)
2. An analysis of DeepSeek's R1-Zero and R1 (419 points | 173 comments)
3. Blueskyfeedbot: Post RSS Feeds to Bluesky via GitHub Actions (62 points | 25 comments)
4. SmolGPT: A minimal PyTorch implementation for training a small LLM from scratch (230 points | 29 comments)
5. OpenAI says it has evidence DeepSeek used its model to train competitor (467 points | 1248 comments)
6. Building a T1D smartwatch for my son from scratch (237 points | 34 comments)
7. Proper decoupling capacitor practices, and why you should leave 100nF behind (37 points | 13 comments)
8. Mathesar – an intutive spreadsheet-like interface to Postgres data (46 points | 7 comments)
9. Advice for a friend who wants to start a blog (89 points | 51 comments)
10. Classic Duck Hunt game made in JavaScript and Kaplay (32 points | 12 comments)
11. From C++ to Clojure: Jank language promises best of both (94 points | 27 comments)
12. Parsing PDFs (and more) in Elixir using Rust (85 points | 10 comments)
13. Etleap (YC W13) Is Hiring a Senior Software Engineer (SF) ( | hide)
14. Exposed DeepSeek database leaking sensitive information, including chat history (463 points | 304 comments)
15. Game developers keep reinventing Tetris (7 points | discuss)
16. A major Postgres upgrade with zero downtime (128 points | 45 comments)
17. Asteroid Impact on Earth 2032 with Probability 1% and 8Mt Energy (235 points | 210 comments)
18. Airflow – Stream media files directly from macOS to AirPlay devices (87 points | 36 comments)
19. Case Study: ByteDance Uses eBPF to Enhance Networking Performance (125 points | 14 comments)
20. Younger cannabis users have reduced brain function, finds largest study yet (188 points | 143 comments)
21. An update on Dart macros and data serialization (122 points | 98 comments)
22. Keymapper: A cross-platform context-aware key remapper (48 points | 12 comments)
23. We got hit by an alarmingly well-prepared phish spammer (162 points | 99 comments)
24. Ötzi the Lyme Mummy (2019) (66 points | 22 comments)
25. I still like Sublime Text (994 points | 519 comments)
26. Cardan grille (38 points | 2 comments)
27. Soviet Shoe Factory Principle (94 points | 80 comments)
28. Making the video that made Gorillaz (160 points | 36 comments)
29. Dead Games (132 points | 44 comments)
30. Society for Technical Communication to permanently close its doors (75 points | 21 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, January 30, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
